programme.title: We Are Family - Ep15
programme.desc: We Are Family celebrates the inspiring journeys of new immigrants in Taiwanovercoming challenges, embracing differences, and building new lives. Through heartfelt stories of love, resilience, and community, discover how theyre not just settling in, but helping Taiwan shine brighter.

programme.title: Battle Tour Ep118
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1068
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1069
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World Ep787
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player Ep561
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Way Back Into Love Ep6
programme.desc: Way Back into Love follows Xiao-qing Yang, who returns to her hometown Hualien with her daughter to help run her familys guesthouse. Reuniting with her childhood friend Bi-zhong, a quiet romance rekindles. Meanwhile, a fiery connection sparks with architect Zhi-bin during a renovation project. Caught between two men with contrasting values, Xiao-qing must navigate love, identity, and homecoming amid emotional twists and lifes rediscoveries.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Amid the recession caused by the pandemic, debt-ridden wedding planner, Sheng, finds a lifeline as he transitions into a funeral planner. His unconventional approach leads to unexpected success, and his attitude toward his career and life is transformed after being inspired by the respected Master Wen.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Go for Broke
programme.desc: A ruthless drug trafficking group has destroyed countless families due to drug addiction, including Zhang Yao's family. Vowing to take revenge, Zhang Yao teams up with Detective An to take down the drug lords. As their revenge plot unfolds, do they share a common foe or harbour personal agendas?

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: After boarding an unauthorized cargo ship and finding its entire crew dead, the Hong Kong Customs officers uncover a hidden cache of illegal weapons linked to an international conflict. As Customs officer Zhou Zheng Li and Interpols Ying go undercover, they unveil a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: YOLO
programme.desc: Feeling lost and aimless, Le Ying chooses to withdraw from society after a short working experience. After a series of unexpected events one day, she decides to embrace life anew. She sees a chance for a fresh start when she meets a boxing coach, yet the challenges ahead far exceed her expectations, marking a vibrant start to her journey.

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: A massive fire caused by illegal garbage smuggling has triggered a radiation crisis in Hong Kong. Government advisor Simon joins the crisis response team led by Acting Chief Executive to avert the disaster. A fire brigade is tasked to enter the radiation zone and stop the cesium fallout. Facing the unprecedented catastrophe, can they save the city?

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: Young Chan Lok Kwun accidentally stumbles into the Kowloon Walled City while fleeing, subsequently finding purpose amid chaos and gaining wisdom. Bonding with Shin, Twelfth Master and AV, they unite under Tornado's leadership to defend against the villain, Mr Big's assaults, and pledge to protect the safe haven of the Walled City together.

programme.title: An Abandoned Team
programme.desc: Uncle Jia is bad-tempered and lives alone. His forced retirement, failed marriage and strained relationship with his daughter have left him in despair, prompting him to consider ending his life. Fortunately, he is rescued by a stray dog and an animal welfare volunteer, allowing him to rediscover his purpose in life.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: After legendary kung fu star Jackie Chan adopts the panda Hu Hu, an international crime syndicate places a massive bounty on the bear. Joined by his agent and Hu Hus caretaker, Jackie embarks on a daring quest to outsmart the villains.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hons pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru S1 Ep17
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep1
programme.desc: A Sweet Meet and Greet - Ten home bakers enter the kitchen and put their spin on a chocolate carousel filled with decadent mini desserts; in the Elimination Challenge, the bakers give a sweet introduction to who they are with a dessert.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Mad About Choux - The remaining nine home bakers will play with pastry, as they master the art of choux. In the Elimination Challenge, the bakers must keep their cool and serve an epic ice cream sandwich.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Veggies for Dessert - The home bakers attempt to prove that chocolate and vegetables can go together.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep4
programme.desc: A History in the Baking - The seven remaining home bakers use their noodles to make chocolate pasta.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Let's Par-Tea - With sweet safety off the table, the top six bakers must create a scrumptious illusion by mastering a gravity-defying cake. In the elimination challenge, the home bakers create desserts using a flavor of tea.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Bakes in Full Bloom - In the Technique Test, the five remaining home bakers do the chocolate truffle shuffle and create a picture-perfect display made entirely out of chocolate. In the Elimination Challenge, the bakers get botanical.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Haute Chocolate - The final four bakers are in for a big (and small) surprise as they must master the macaron and its larger cousin the macaronade. With the finale one challenge away, fashion becomes their passion as the bakers look to the runway for their dessert.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Finale: Once Upon a Baker... - In the season finale, the home bakers take on the most demanding bake of the entire competition: telling their baking story through four delectable dessert chapters.

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahassee, and Wichita embark on a journey to find Little Rock, while dealing with a horde of super-zombies migrating from city to city and destroying everything in their wake.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: The Scorpion King 4: Quest For Power
programme.desc: Set in ancient Eastern Europe, legendary warrior Mathayus is betrayed by his pupil. In a race against time, Mathayus must defeat this adversary in time to find a treasure holding the powerto rule the world.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mist swirls around the base of Shanghai's skyline. From the city, tigers and monkeys seem as unreal and distant as dragons and mermaids emerging through the mist. Yet they exist as rare survivors in an extraordinary and diverse landscape. From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mission Black Rhino - Its a critical time for two black rhinos in Zambia. Four year old female Apson and fourteen year old bull Kango are at the core of a complex relocation mission thats part of a grand plan to save a species.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Carnivore Rescue - Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africas apex predators.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankinds effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living on the living beach?

programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep11
programme.desc: South Africa - Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Monkey Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Mother's Tale - The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkeys paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Extreme - Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Nova Scotia - At either edge of the province, Nova Scotia proves that any beach is built from raw forces in opposition, but also that balance between those forces is necessary if life is to thrive.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The Yucatn Peninsula is home to tourists, sea turtles, and sargassum seaweed. How do the three coexist in harmony? Is it sustainable? Uncover the secrets behind this Mexican beach, including an ancient birthing ritual that takes place each year.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Get ready to understand the science behind Hawaii's stunning beaches. Why does sand appear white, yellow, black, green and red? How do active volcanoes change the coastline? Are other forces at play in shaping these incredible beaches?

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - Its a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankinds effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living on the living beach?

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Wild West - Trek through the Canadian rainforest, look up at dizzying redwood trees, and explore giant kelp forests with Lizzie as she experiences the wild west coast of North America. Cross paths with wolves and bears while salmon travel upstream to lay eggs.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Crowded Seas - Dip into North Americas southern coastal waters, where opalescent squid mate, sea turtles nest, and mobula rays take flight for the sake of romance. Fly a specialized drone with Lizzie as she swoops in for a breath sample from a blue whale.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Coral Seas - Marvel at North Americas natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, digs for ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Prowl with jaguars that stalk a Costa Rican beach and meet the planets biggest sharks.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Strange Shores - Tag along with Lizzie on her most dangerous Atlantic adventure yet: free diving with bull sharks. Explore otherworldly Gulf Coast swamps filled with hungry alligators, crafty snapping turtles, and tiny but mighty beach mice who strengthen sand dunes.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Humpback Birth of a Giant - Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whales life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Squirrel Monkey Island - Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where its mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Realm of the Spectacled Bear - Get to know South Americas only bear species. Witness the shy and charismatic spectacled bear play, forage, and look for mates at the secluded Chaparri Ecological Reserve in Northern Peru.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Wild West - Trek through the Canadian rainforest, look up at dizzying redwood trees, and explore giant kelp forests with Lizzie as she experiences the wild west coast of North America. Cross paths with wolves and bears while salmon travel upstream to lay eggs.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Coral Seas - Marvel at North Americas natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, digs for ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Prowl with jaguars that stalk a Costa Rican beach and meet the planets biggest sharks.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Strange Shores - Tag along with Lizzie on her most dangerous Atlantic adventure yet: free diving with bull sharks. Explore otherworldly Gulf Coast swamps filled with hungry alligators, crafty snapping turtles, and tiny but mighty beach mice who strengthen sand dunes.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Humpback Birth of a Giant - Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whales life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Squirrel Monkey Island - Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where its mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Realm of the Spectacled Bear - Get to know South Americas only bear species. Witness the shy and charismatic spectacled bear play, forage, and look for mates at the secluded Chaparri Ecological Reserve in Northern Peru.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Sub Sahara - The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors. Male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is eerily familiar.

programme.title: Monkey Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Leaving Home - An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lankas kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle and theres a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Devils - For Tasmanian devils, dominance is the name of the game during mating season. Meet males who fight for the right to pass on their genes, and learn about the violent, noisy etiquette of these carnivorous marsupials mealtime.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Young Devils - Tasmanian Devils might have the most infamous reputations of any of the countrys marsupials, but these spirited scrappers also have another side. Theyre committed parents and heroic defenders of their pouch-reared young.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wombat Wood - In the cool highlands near Australias Snowy Mountains is Wombat Wood. There, dotted amongst the trees and dense foliage, are over a hundred wombat burrows. But when some of the burrows are flooded, the wombats need to find safety.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Joey's Journey - Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, whos trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Koala Country - Despite being one of Australias best-known marsupials, koalas live only in the east and southeast parts of the continent. Learn how their lives and behaviors vary in these different regions.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Breeding Season - Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Kimba's Rise - While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba prides nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision its how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Super Powers - See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Australia - Scan the Australian skies, which regularly deliver some of the worlds most volatile weather. Await cooling monsoon rains, watch lightning ignite vast wildfires, and marvel at the ingenious adaptations that help wildlife deal with these extremes.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep2
programme.desc: North America - Experience the powerful, colourful phenomena that swirl across the heavens in North America. Watch polar bears search for food under the aurora borealis, map the frigid path of a polar vortex, and elude violent tornadoes with a prairie dog family.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Africa - Observe the eternal search for water that defines the lives of Africas wild animals. Witness the biggest marine feeding frenzy on Earth, see how cobras stock up on solar power, and join wildebeest herds and elephant clans on their epic migrations.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep4
programme.desc: South America - Learn how South Americas rich diversity of weather fuels an even richer diversity of life. Examine the Amazon rainforests oxygen-breathing trees, follow the arc of a vast cloud river, and meet flamingos that thrive in the suns scorching UV rays.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 3, Episode 1 - Stacey Solomon and her team help Tom, Chloe and their two daughters transform their home.

programme.title: George Clarke's Remarkable Renovations S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Railway Goods Shed, Gloucestershire - George Clarke meets Marcus and Katheryn who are converting a huge Victorian goods shed into a beautiful new home for their family.

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Custard Week - It's custard week on The Great South African Bake Off and the bakers kick things off with a Franginpane Tart with Crme Anglaise. For their technical, Siba tasks them with producing a South African favourite - custard-filled doughnuts. The Showstopper sees the bakers making their own Bavarian Cream Gateaux.

programme.title: Nisha Katona's Home Kitchen S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Nisha Katona cooks a traditional monsoon mushroom curry with grapes, some tasty barbecued corn on the cob, and a cote de boeuf with the best spiced chilli rub.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Justine encounters parrots in Kuala Lumpur and orangutans in Semenggoh. Chef Wong serves a delicious Penang classic and then Justine makes popular local dishes like mee kolok and mouth-watering curry puffs.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Justine explores Malaysian street food as she travels from Kuching to Penang, tasting the diverse local flavours. She also cooks delicious sticky wings and uncovers chef Raphael Jay Peter Lee's creative take on the classic risotto.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Justine travels to the Terengganu cultural village to experience the cultural heritage of Malaysia. She learns about interesting food and musical traditions before heading on a culinary adventure with chef Afiq Matkhir.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Justine discovers the lush flora of Penang at the tranquil Tropical Spice Garden and then devours a beloved local dish, the oyster omelette. She also visits Tegudon Tourism Village and makes a spicy Malaysian chicken curry with delicious purple rice.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Justine begins her day with an exciting sunrise hike up Ria Lookout in Sabah and then prepares scrumptious Malaysian breakfast noodles. She explores Penang Hill before devouring chef Christopher Wan's Sarawak laksa.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Justine finds unique tea practices, the world of bees and honey in Sabah and traditional, delicious fish dishes that local chefs make. She then prepares lobak and nasi dagang.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Justine draws attention to Malaysia's vibrant nature and enticing dishes. She cooks an inviting fruit salad and hosts a tempting seafood barbecue before presenting onde-onde, the sweet delight of Malaysian cuisine.

programme.title: Grand Designs S20 Ep9
programme.desc: Series 20, Episode 9 - In 2015, Vicky and Ed set out to transform a derelict cowshed into a 21st-century smallholding in Somerset. Six years on, how much has this wildly ambitious project changed their lives?

programme.title: The First Class Travel Show S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hong Kong - Josie Gibson heads to Hong Kong, flying first class to stay at the Rosewood Hotel where she has her own butler! She also heads out on a luxury yacht to see the region's many islands, and enjoys cocktails.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off S7 Ep6
programme.desc: Cheese Week - Cheese lovers, get ready! Episode 6 brings the much-anticipated Cheese Week, where the remaining bakers must rise to the occasion, crafting mouth-watering cheesy creations that will leave both judges and viewers craving more. With only a few contestants left, this episode promises to be a high-stakes, high-taste challenge, full of drama and, of course, plenty of cheese.

programme.title: Listing Mauritius S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Grahame gets some bad news. Rinie's client need a rental beach house. Samuel shows a family around a house on the river in Azuri.

programme.desc: Divine Dinner Parties - Gok cooks up three tantalising Asian recipes perfect for dinner parties. He makes aromatic Asian spiced cauliflower and a bubbling showpiece of a miso hot pot.

programme.title: Gok Wan's Easy Asian S3 Ep4
programme.desc: A Night In - Gok Wan shares his menu for the perfect night in, including prawn toast, a fragrant egg and roast potato curry, and almond biscuits with an ice cream treat.

programme.title: Ranch To Table S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Carnitas And Brownies - It's one of the busiest times of the year on the ranch. Elizabeth and Austin are headed out with a crew to gather cattle.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep1
programme.desc: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow - Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep2
programme.desc: Tacos / Rainy Day - When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep40
programme.desc: Dogcathalon - Mayor Sniffington mixed up the dates for the Dogcathalon and it turns out its being held today! Panicked, Tag and Scooch rush off to make sure the three race spots are race ready so they can be approved by the Top Dog. / The Dogcathalon Race has officially started! Tag goes into Crew Chief mode, running around to ensure Team Pawston is ready for each part of the race. But with Sam unable to race, he encourages Tag to take his place and win it all for Pawston.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep14
programme.desc: Chef J's Tale - Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along theyre so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep13
programme.desc: Straycation Part II - While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep16
programme.desc: Shack Attack - "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot Qilin and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep17
programme.desc: We Meat Again - After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert but magical chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep18
programme.desc: A Hair-ifying Night - Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep39
programme.desc: The Last Dumont - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep17
programme.desc: We Meat Again - After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert but magical chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged Ep54
programme.desc: Super Scraptors - SkrapIt steals the Truxs new supply of superchargers but accidentally spills them in Scraptor Valley causing the crater to be overrun with SUPER SCRAPTORS

programme.desc: Sherman's Pet/ Marco Polo - Sherman begs Peabody to keep a Wolly Mammoth he names Captain Cools as his pet; Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges to discover spaghetti.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep2
programme.desc: Disarmed & Dangerous / Frankenleftovers - Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignmentto create life!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble's Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep15
programme.desc: Board Silly / Sing for the Fences - Tag and Scooch play Scoochs favorite board game outside, using the whole town of Pawston as the board. \Tag thinks its time for an update to the Pawston City Anthem, which inspires a city-wide music competition where competitors will create and perform new Pawston anthems.

programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Sukis prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his friend Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own Wu and Wei.

programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to DAngelo to aid an injured dragon, and DAngelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep10
programme.desc: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 1 - The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships and to learn exactly what the ships are.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep11
programme.desc: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 2 - Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but it's not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep26
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2 - Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep27
programme.desc: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2 - When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep13
programme.desc: Tales from the Fox's Tails - When a mysterious creature keeps stealing peoples prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yis prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep14

When Everest doesnt return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLis intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep19
programme.desc: Please Hold for the Next Representative - Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think theyve solved one issue, another springs up and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone but its the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yis rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures existence and Yis magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the citys citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep145

programme.desc: Peanut Butter & Jelly / Potato Skins - Chef tries to make the Stump Band the best peanut butter and jelly sandwiches during their Snack Break. // It's Potato Day, Henry's favorite holiday! Chef wants to whip up Henry's favorite potato dish.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Nopales Tacos - Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales.

programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.desc: The Missing Mammoth: A Holiday Mystery - Special - Everyone's decking the halls to get in the holiday spirit. But Sam and Kit are blasted back in time to the Ice Age and meet some wooly new pals.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pups Save an Adventure / Pups Save a Surprise - While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety! // It seems like a regular day in Adventure Bay as the Paw Patrol is called to duty.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mayor's Race / Pups Save an Outlaw's Loot - Its the annual Mayors Race, and Mayor Humdinger is planning his most devious cheating scheme yet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up on a wayward airborne cruise all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep223
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Kangaroo Safari / The Crew Plays In The Construction Games - Rubble & Crew build a kangaroo safari for Lucas and Lily right in the Bark Yard... until their kangaroo hops away! // Speed Meister challenges Rubble & Crew to compete in the ultimate build-off:

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Crew And Rocky Build A Bear Island - Rocky visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay just in time to see Builder Cove's new baby bear! But when Park Ranger Rose asks for construction help, Speed Meister accidentally ruins the bears' home.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta - Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so it's up to Dora to find its rainbow water.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, Super Shark and Captain Kelp help to bring it back!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Air Sharkdog - When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Sick as a Sharkdog - When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Scoop - When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring - Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Paddingtron/Paddington's First Diwali - Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Jungle Horn - Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him to get it back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mustache / Pups Save the Funhouse - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Deep Dark Disco / Finception - The Sharks help Wavey Jones find his disco ball so he can throw a jaw-some party. // When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe - Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucy's Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed.

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Little Doras Big Adventure / Bye Bye Balloon - Big Red Chicken accidentally shrinks Dora and Boots so it's up to Dora's little brother and sister to help get them big again. // Dora rescues Boots and her friends from Benny's out-of-control balloon.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Missing Mammoth: A Holiday Mystery - Special - Everyone's decking the halls to get in the holiday spirit. But Sam and Kit are blasted back in time to the Ice Age and meet some wooly new pals.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep202

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Going Wild - When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep204
programme.desc: A Not So Grand Opening - When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.desc: The Secret Password - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Pups Fight Fire - Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge - Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support.
