programme.desc: Valiente: A Tracker Story - Tracker and Carlos come across a series of nocturnal animals fleeing the Shadow Jungle. Tracker must brave his fear of the dark and stop a new villain, Lucita Mala.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes A Road - When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep225
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Rooftop Stage / The Crew Fixes The Lighthouse - When Grocer Gabriel and Sierra Sparkle both need construction help before Banana Day, Rubble & Crew has their paws full.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Solar-Powered Bus / The Crew Builds A Lifeguard Tower - When Speed Meister steals Rubble & Crew's bus, the pups have to stop it in time for Sierra Sparkle's big concert!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift - Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Party Animal - When Sharkdog accidentally destroys the boardwalk, Max and Sharkpack must prove to everyone that Sharkdog is a really great pet.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Working Like a Sharkdog - All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Sharkdog's Got Talent - Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chlo's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit helps them to get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Truckball Team-Up - Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

programme.title: Valiente: A Tracker Story Ep0
programme.desc: Valiente: A Tracker Story - Tracker and Carlos come across a series of nocturnal animals fleeing the Shadow Jungle. Tracker must brave his fear of the dark and stop a new villain, Lucita Mala.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Old Shark Bride / Swimming Solo - Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony. // Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye - Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall!

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Singin in the Tub / Show and Share - Dora and Boots help Benny gain the confidence to sing at the Canta Conmigo show. // Dora helps Boots find a special Heart Banana to show everyone at Show and Share.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Unidentified Shiny Object / The Case of the Crying Monkey - Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom. // The duo follows the jungle sounds to locate a baby monkey.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Fast and The Fishy - Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Big Picture - Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Air Sharkdog - When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Monday Funday - The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Valiente: A Tracker Story Ep0
programme.desc: Valiente: A Tracker Story - Tracker and Carlos come across a series of nocturnal animals fleeing the Shadow Jungle. Tracker must brave his fear of the dark and stop a new villain, Lucita Mala.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Solar-Powered Bus - When Speed Meister steals Rubble & Crew's bus, the pups have to stop it in time for Sierra Sparkle's big concert!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep146
programme.desc: The Silly Sounds - When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep147
programme.desc: Super Hero Teacher - Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Granola Bars / Nachos - When Morton the Butterfly's travel snack crash lands on the Stump, Chef and Olly compete to make him the best snack for his journey.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Sloppy Joes - When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean. But keeping clean isn't easy when sloppy joes are the dish of the day.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze - When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become: Special Mission Blaze!

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Case of the Big Chomp / The Secret of the Salt Cave - Who took a chomp out of Bill and Jill's satellite van in the swamp? // Sam and Kit investigate the strange shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave.

programme.title: Valiente: A Tracker Story
programme.desc: Valiente: A Tracker Story - Tracker and Carlos come across a series of nocturnal animals fleeing the Shadow Jungle. Tracker must brave his fear of the dark and stop a new villain, Lucita Mala.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep100
programme.desc: Lights Out - When the lights go out in Home Dome, the Teletubbies get the giggles! The lights come back on again and there's Tubby Custard mess everywhere.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Kite - Dee encourages a friend to say 'kite' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a flying kite, a roaring kite, a dragon kite and even a snoring kite!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep7
programme.desc: A Band for the Stand - Helping Hand builds a bandstand, so Mae-Mae decides to form a band with her friends.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Dizzy - Messy and friends go on a rollercoaster adventure and figure out why Stan Tall is in such a spin!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Driving - With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Potato Time - At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Song of Peace - Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Bumpy And The Wise Old Wolfhound - Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad sent her a homemade video to lift her spirits. It tells the tale of Barnicus' quest to heal her spotty dog named Bumpy.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Work - In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Andy and the Tiger Cubs - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Bandhavgarh tiger reserve in India on a baby animal mission to track down a female tiger and her new born cubs. Along the way, our team outwit a sloth that strays dangerously close to the den where the cubs are resting.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mission: Day Off - Sylvie and Katrina stop to help Dawn from the toy shop, Harry the Baker and Pete the Postie on their way to the park cafe on their day off.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mandrill and Sand Lizard - Aneeshwar Kunchala and Lizzie Daly meet the mandrill and sand lizard, and reveal their wild connection - they use colour to attract a mate.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Meet the Pirates - Captain Captain doesn't think her new crew, Sandy and Seaweed, are up to the job. Unless they can both convince her that they should stay, she is going to send them back to the Pirate Agency. Sandy and Seaweed decide to write a special song all about them in order to persuade Captain Captain that they should remain as her crew.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep34
programme.desc: The List Badge - Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep33
programme.desc: The Wish Badge - Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep32
programme.desc: The Size Badge - The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Harbin Ice City, China - GrimHQ overheats so lands in Harbin Ice City, melting the amazing ice sculptures.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep9
programme.desc: Thomas' Not So Lucky Day - It's Friday the 13th in Italy and Thomas tries to improve his luck by following Lorenzo and Beppe's advice on superstitions.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Ribbon Fall - The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah and Duck to their favourite seasonal event in the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Shallot Circus - The Shallots have discovered acrobatics and are inspired to put on a show.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Reycling - Fred, Fifi and Ari call Stanley to help them with their recycling drive by coming up with a way of repurposing all the towns' old stuff. Stanley makes a crazy golf course!

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Seaside - Myrtle, Sophie and Benjamin call Stanley to teach them how to make a sandcastle. Myrtle asks for a bigger one, so big it turns into a sandcastle resort!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep40
programme.desc: It's Time to Make a Sorrel Drink - JoJo & Gran Gran make Sorrel drinks together, and JoJo comes up with her own recipe that uses her favourite ingredients.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.desc: The Music Video Badge - The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.desc: Kite - Dee encourages a friend to say 'kite' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a flying kite, a roaring kite, a dragon kite and even a snoring kite!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep7
programme.desc: A Band for the Stand - Helping Hand builds a bandstand, so Mae-Mae decides to form a band with her friends.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Dizzy - Messy and friends go on a rollercoaster adventure and figure out why Stan Tall is in such a spin!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Driving - With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Potato Time - At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Song of Peace - Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Bumpy And The Wise Old Wolfhound - Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad sent her a homemade video to lift her spirits. It tells the tale of Barnicus' quest to heal her spotty dog named Bumpy.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Work - In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Andy and the Tiger Cubs - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Bandhavgarh tiger reserve in India on a baby animal mission to track down a female tiger and her new born cubs. Along the way, our team outwit a sloth that strays dangerously close to the den where the cubs are resting.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mission: Day Off - Sylvie and Katrina stop to help Dawn from the toy shop, Harry the Baker and Pete the Postie on their way to the park cafe on their day off.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mandrill and Sand Lizard - Aneeshwar Kunchala and Lizzie Daly meet the mandrill and sand lizard, and reveal their wild connection - they use colour to attract a mate.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Meet the Pirates - Captain Captain doesn't think her new crew, Sandy and Seaweed, are up to the job. Unless they can both convince her that they should stay, she is going to send them back to the Pirate Agency. Sandy and Seaweed decide to write a special song all about them in order to persuade Captain Captain that they should remain as her crew.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep34
programme.desc: The List Badge - Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep33
programme.desc: The Wish Badge - Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep32
programme.desc: The Size Badge - The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

Here, he would host his famous friends from the Chinese literati. Farmer Thomas Lim goes in search of this man's secret to cultivating the perfect rambutan, and a life well lived.

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal
programme.desc: A unique project along Tokyo's JR Ome Line is turning the area's empty homes into hotel rooms with one station currently acting as the front desk. See how tourism is revitalizing the community.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Seasoning The Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: In Turkey, one NGO gives the Syrian refugees a chance to smile again by helping them perform circuses. Now, they head out to take the stage for the kids affected by the 2023 Turkey earthquake.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: A Home For Hope
programme.desc: An NPO offers free tutoring to children born in Japan with foreign roots. More than just a study space, it's a second home where belonging grows and hopes for the future quietly take root.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Trailblazers
programme.desc: Artist Suzuki Mai works to promote kumiko, a traditional craft in which small wooden pieces are joined together without the use of nails. We examine how she is interlocking tradition and technology.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Document 72 Hours
programme.desc: Nozokizaka, a steep hill in Tokyo's Toshima Ward, takes people's breath away in more ways than one. For three days, we asked people why they go up and down this road that's also a test of stamina.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.desc: In Turkey, one NGO gives the Syrian refugees a chance to smile again by helping them perform circuses. Now, they head out to take the stage for the kids affected by the 2023 Turkey earthquake.

programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: In 2024, Miyakoshi Akiko won a New York Times' Best Illustrated Children's Book Award. We see how she creates art, using charcoal and watercolors. And we discover the inspiration behind her work.

programme.title: 1/45: Gambling Addiction
programme.desc: 1 in 45 Japanese are suspected of a gambling addiction. We follow a man who made a clean break from gambling, overcoming the crisis of a broken family, and is in the recovery process from addiction.

programme.title: Hit The Road Gunma
programme.desc: To truly enjoy Gunma, travel by car is key. We start from Takasaki, where the bullet train stops, and make our way to Kusatsu hot springs, with world Heritage sites and local food along the way.

programme.title: In Pursuit Of Sustainable Fashion

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: A Home For Hope
programme.desc: An NPO offers free tutoring to children born in Japan with foreign roots. More than just a study space, it's a second home where belonging grows and hopes for the future quietly take root.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: In 2024, Miyakoshi Akiko won a New York Times' Best Illustrated Children's Book Award. We see how she creates art, using charcoal and watercolors. And we discover the inspiration behind her work.

programme.title: 1/45: Gambling Addiction
programme.desc: 1 in 45 Japanese are suspected of a gambling addiction. We follow a man who made a clean break from gambling, overcoming the crisis of a broken family, and is in the recovery process from addiction.

programme.title: Hit The Road Gunma
programme.desc: To truly enjoy Gunma, travel by car is key. We start from Takasaki, where the bullet train stops, and make our way to Kusatsu hot springs, with world Heritage sites and local food along the way.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Unruly Catfish
programme.desc: Japan is a seismically active land; the Edo period was no exception. In the aftermath of a major 1855 earthquake, an angry guardian deity set off on a quest to capture those considered responsible.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: While immune checkpoint inhibitors can improve cancer survival rates, they only work in about 20 to 30 percent of patients. We interview Japanese researchers who are trying to overcome this challenge.

programme.title: Jomon 10,000 Years Of Wisdom

programme.title: UFC 319: Du Plessis vs. Chimaev
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to United Center in the Windy City of Chicago on August 17 with a stacked UFC 319 event featuring one of the most highly anticipated middleweight title fights in years. South Africas Dricus Du Plessis has taken UFC by storm since arriving in the Octagon in 2020, and after winning the UFC middleweight crown against Sean Strickland, hes continued to dominate with wins over Israel Adesanya and Strickland in their February rematch. But many believe his toughest test to date will be unbeaten challenger Khamzat Chimaev, whose list of UFC victories includes the names of Robert Whittaker, Kamaru Usman and Gilbert Burns

programme.title: UFC 319: Du Plessis vs. Chimaev
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to United Center in the Windy City of Chicago on August 17 with a stacked UFC 319 event featuring one of the most highly anticipated middleweight title fights in years. South Africas Dricus Du Plessis has taken UFC by storm since arriving in the Octagon in 2020, and after winning the UFC middleweight crown against Sean Strickland, hes continued to dominate with wins over Israel Adesanya and Strickland in their February rematch. But many believe his toughest test to date will be unbeaten challenger Khamzat Chimaev, whose list of UFC victories includes the names of Robert Whittaker, Kamaru Usman and Gilbert Burns

programme.desc: Prelims - When the UFC makes its second trip to Shanghai on August 23rd, one of Chinas top young stars will lead the way as The Mountain Tiger, Zhang Mingyang, faces off with Brazils Johnny Walker in the main event of UFC Fight Night.
